attributes.action: Put up a sign or a light outside a school
attributes.additional_details: The school needs a sign or flashing lights to show drivers that there is a school there. There have been near misses already and I fear someone will get hit especially now it’s dark at pick up.
attributes.background: The school my daughter goes to is on a busy road, there are no signs to slow the traffic down. I have to cross this road with children morning and night and it’s dangerous

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about traffic outside schools, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
                
We have published the following related petitions, which you might like to sign:

Review speed limits outside all places of education: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559842

To make it a law that all schools need bollards outside for child safety: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553305

If you would like the Government to take an action not covered by the above you could start a new petition explaining more clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
